text: Through a Glass Darkly () is a 1961 Swedish drama movie written and directed by Ingmar Bergman. It stars Harriet Andersson, Gunnar Björnstrand, Max von Sydow and Lars Passgård. == Other websites == * * * Category:1961 drama movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ingmar Bergman
title: Through a Glass Darkly (movie)
